product_name: Sawyer Otter Tale Canoe Paddle - Kids' 46"
long_description: Lightweight, tough and just the right size for small hands, the 46 in. Sawyer Otter Tale canoe paddle gets outdoorsy kids on the water with a quality paddle. Features a lightweight, well-balanced, oval fir shaft with a fiberglass-reinforced pine blade. Back of paddle has lined columns so your kids can write down the destinations of their first canoe trips right on the paddle blade. Basic T-grip is easy for small hands to wrap around and control. Front of paddle blade features an illustration of an otter at play. Paddle has a slightly bent 7-degree shaft. Small and compact size also makes this a perfect emergency paddle. Sawyer recommends the Sawyer Otter Tale canoe paddle for kids from 2 to 10 yrs. old.
short_description: Lightweight, tough and just the right size for small hands, the 46 in. Sawyer Otter Tale canoe paddle gets outdoorsy kids on the water with a quality paddle.
